resources.string: Name of the application
Affirmative answer to a dialog box
Negative answer to a dialog box
Placeholder text for the search textbox
Title for the screen that shows history of articles you have read
Text in navigation sidebar that when tapped leads to the History screen
Error message shown when network cannot be reached when loading a page
Error message shown when network cannot be reached when searching. Tapping the message retries the search.
Text for button that retries page loading when tapped
Menu item text for clearing your reading history
Title for dialog box asking if you want to clear your reading history
Message for dialog box asking if you want to clear your reading history
Title for screen that shows list of locally saved pages
Text in navigation sidebar that when tapped leads to the Saved Pages screen
Menu item text for saving the currently active page
Menu item text for sharing the currently active page
Dialog title text for Share list
Lead in text for app receiving URL for sharing
Title for dialog box asking if you want to clear all of your saved pages
Message for dialog box asking if you want to clear all your saved pages
Small toast (popup) message saying that a page is being saved
Small toast (popup) message saying that a page has been saved
Small toast (popup) message saying that a page has failed to save
Menu item text for deleting the currently selected saved pages
Small toast (popup) message saying that the selected saved pages have been deleted
Message in footer of article indicating when the article was last updated. Parameter 1 refers to appropriately formatted timestamp
HTML specifying license of the Wiki and link to appropriate CC page
Title for preference in settings screen for setting which language wikipedia to use
Text in navigation sidebar that when tapped leads to the Settings screen
Placeholder text for the textbox that when typed filters list of language wikipedias from which user can pick a language to use
Search
Menu item for showing list of languages in which this article is available
Text for button that when tapped retries fetching the list of languages in which the current article is available
Message shown when the user requested a list of languages in which the current article is available, but the current article is not available in any other language
Title for settings screen
Menu item that shows user list of languages the current article is available in
Title for screen where user is editing a single section
Text for button that retries page loading when tapped
Text for progress dialog shown when an edit save is in progress
Small toast (popup) message saying that the edit was successful
Message for dialog box specifying that an edit save had failed
Button text to retry a failed edit save
Button text to cancel retrying a failed edit save
Menu item text for showing the Table of Contents for the current article
Message shown to user when no search results are found for a string
Message shown in progress popup dialog while waiting for a random article to be fetched
Generic text for connoting that access is free thanks to mobile operator participation in Wikipedia Zero
Text for toast connoting that Wikipedia Zero status went to OFF and standard data charges may now apply
Searchbar hint incorporting notion that user is searching via Wikipedia Zero so it is free
Settings label for option for warning a Wikipedia Zero user if tapping on an external link
Lengthy explanation of Wikipedia Zero for settings screen
Link title for the Wikipedia Zero FAQ for the app
Settings heading for Wikipedia Zero
Dialog title text to inform Wikipedia Zero user that the user is about to leave the app for an external link
Dialog text to ask Wikipedia Zero user whether the user wants to continue to an external site where standard data charges may apply
Dialog button text for Wikipedia Zero user to continue to an external site where standard data charges may apply
Dialog button text for Wikipedia Zero user to not continue to an external site where standard data charges may apply

The first time Wikipedia Zero mode is On and the first time it is detected as transitioning from On to Off this is the question posed to the Wikipedia Zero user as to whether the user wants to read the Wikipedia Zero FAQ
Dialog button text for Wikipedia Zero user to learn more about Wikipedia Zero at the Wikipedia Zero FAQ for the app
Dialog button text for Wikipedia Zero user to dismiss the prompt about visiting the Wikipedia Zero FAQ for the app
Generic Settings heading for Wikipedia Zero
Prerelease label text for enabling Wikipedia Zero Devmode to enable Wikipedia Zero support
Prerelease explanation text explaining that Wikipedia Zero Devmode on means that Wikipedia Zero detection will be turned on
